overview:
Bradley is an aspiring entrepreneur and zealous undergraduate student, majoring in Business Administration and dual-concentrating in Marketing and Entrepreneurship at Drexel University.

Bradley is ranked as the Top National College Entrepreneur of 2009 by Entrepreneur Magazine. He co-founded 3SecondReceipts LLC with his mentor and older brother, Timothy Ericson. 3SecondReceipts aims to solve the inconviences caused by paper receipts by developing a solution that enables digital receipts. Using the data rich digital receipt, 3SecondReceipts plans to provide analytics and relevant, personal rewards to consumers and businesses.

Bradley expects nothing less than perfection and a positive attitude in his academic, athletic and professional endeavors.
